Text.val: 30.10.22013 JH/SH SCR18486 Changed first selection of LGCD to improve performance
03.07.2013 SH SCR18243 Copy of OPH411C to be able to submit

SQL_STMT_U.val: select A.LGCD_ADMNO,A.LGCD_LDGR_NO, A.LGCD_LGCH_ID, A.LGCD_LINENO, A.LGCD_VALUEDATE, cast((A.LGCD_AMOUNTDEBIT - A.LGCD_AMOUNTCREDIT) as decimal(13,2)), A.LGCD_DEBITCREDITCHECK, A.LGCD_DESCRIPTION from :1/LGCD a where exists (select * from :1/BANK where BANK_LEDG_NO_ADVANCES = A.LGCD_LDGR_NO) and exists (select * from :1/ADMU where ADMU_ADMNO = A.LGCD_ADMNO and ADMU_HUSR_ID = ':2' and ADMU_ALLOW_MODIFY_LEDGER = 'Y') and A.LGCD_DEBITCREDITCHECK = 'N' and A.LGCD_DATE > ':3' and (A.LGCD_AMOUNTDEBIT <> 0 or A.LGCD_AMOUNTCREDIT <> 0) and (A.LGCD_AMOUNTDEBIT - A.LGCD_AMOUNTCREDIT) < 0 and exists (select * from :1/LGCD b where B.LGCD_LINENO <> A.LGCD_LINENO and B.LGCD_ADMNO = A.LGCD_ADMNO and B.LGCD_LDGR_NO = A.LGCD_LDGR_NO and B.LGCD_VALUEDATE = A.LGCD_VALUEDATE and B.LGCD_DEBITCREDITCHECK = 'N' and (B.LGCD_AMOUNTDEBIT <> 0 or B.LGCD_AMOUNTCREDIT <> 0)) FOR FETCH ONLY

Text.val: This program uses "force record delete" condition
Program handled/delete only one row per call (end task condition : YES/after)
if LGCD_LGCH_ID=0 delete record, otherwise set LGCD_DEBITCREDITCHECK='Y'
(this program delete and update only the credit rows. The debit rows
will be deleted/updated in tasks 'Update LGCD'/'Delete LGCD')
